text: reports are coming in of the death of
Tariq Aziz one of Saddam Hussein's most
trusted aides and Iraq's former foreign

come in within the last few minutes it's
been confirmed by the Iraqi Ministry of
Justice Tariq Aziz became a familiar
face on many of our television screens
during the first Gulf War to liberate
Kuwait let's tell you just a little bit
more about him because he really was the
international face of Saddam Hussein's
regime for many many years former Iraqi
foreign minister former Iraqi Deputy
Prime Minister Tareq Aziz there you see
pictures of him with Saddam Hussein he
surrendered to US forces in April 2003
went through a trial and was sentenced
to death in fact I think we've just got
the line up to Baghdad in the BBC Sally
in Nabil Sally can you confirm this for
us yes it has been confirmed from
different sources whether miracle or
security sources that Tareq Aziz the
former vice president has died in a

Austria prison southern Baghdad but once
his case deteriorated the prison
authorities they removed him to a
hospital where he died there the man is
nearly 80 years as you said he has been
given a life sentence in 2011 and then a
death sentence in 2012 he was a very
prominent figure and confident of the
former President Saddam Hussein for more
than 30 years he was the vice president
and he was a spokesman for Saddam
Hussein's regime inside in front of the
international community because he
speaks very fluent English he was the
only Christian in in Saddam Hussein's
regime and one of his famous coats in
2003 before the US invasion of Iraq he
said that the US forces are invading

claimed he turned himself in in 2003 and
say
then he has been in trial and finally he
